title: Ticket #6428: store credentials in the SEC_CREDENTIAL_DIRECTORY as Owner
description:
Currently, credentials are stored using the username the job will run as. When running as owner, this is correct, but when using slot users, pilots, or running as 'nobody' this causes collisions among the running jobs.

So, two things to do here:

  1. In the shadow, already return the credential for the owner of the job, regardless of the username requested.

  2. In the starter, ask for the owner of the job, rather then the username the starter/job will run as.
